edu.uchsc.ccp.dmap
Class DefaultTokenizer

java.lang.Object
  edu.uchsc.ccp.dmap.DMAPTokenizer
      edu.uchsc.ccp.dmap.DefaultTokenizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<DMAPToken>, java.util.Iterator<DMAPToken>
public class DefaultTokenizer
extends DMAPTokenizer

The DefaultTokenizer is used to create a token sequence when an input string is handed to the Parser. It handles some punctuation and numbers, but it isn't very smart or complete.

Author:
R. James Firby
